item.title: A Proactive Approach to Impostor Syndrome
item.description: We all know about Imposter Syndrome yet the epidemic seems to be growing, especially when breaking into a new career (like those learning to code). No doubt I’ve felt it in tech and elsewhere in life, as I’m sure you have. While there’s plenty of articles and videos on how to fight the self-doubt that comes along with Imposter Syndrome, I’d like to offer an alternative approach: Use it. You can try to fight Impostor Syndrome or change your mindset, and doing so has worked for some people.
